content: rené d **aramis** de vannes born rené d herblay is a fictional character in the novels the three musketeers by alexandre dumas père he and the other two musketeers athos and porthos are friends of the novels protagonist d artagnan and the four of them have many adventures aramis loves and intrigues women though he is a jesuit and abbot he is portrayed as ambitious audacious and always well dressed despite his machiavellian attitude aramis holds very firmly to the sacred concept of friendship the refined pattern of these socks as well as the gold color of the knitted sample fits his character perfectly the pattern of my musketeer socks are just low-key enough to be wearable for all the men in your life and just interesting enough to save the knitter from being bored to tears while making them you can find the other 3 musketeer socks here athos 1 porthos 2 d artagnan 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/athos-2 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/porthos-2 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dartagnan
